mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_paper (paperId, paperName, questionNumber, courseName, paperState, paperGrade, createTime, updateTime, reserve1, reserve2) VALUES (#{paperId}, #{paperName}, #{questionNumber}, #{courseName}, #{paperState}, #{paperGrade}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{reserve1}, #{reserve2})
mapper.update: UPDATE edu_paper SET paperId=#{paperId}, paperName=#{paperName}, questionNumber=#{questionNumber}, courseName=#{courseName}, paperState=#{paperState}, paperGrade=#{paperGrade},createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{createTime}, reserve1=#{reserve1}, reverse2=#{reverse2} where paperId=#{paperId}
